Sentence.value: A catheter was inserted into an artery in your groin or arm.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: A catheter was inserted into an [[artery|C0003842]] in your [[groin|C0018246]] or arm.

Sentence.value: If you had a blockage, you may have had angioplasty and a stent placed in your heart during the procedure.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: If you had a blockage, you may have had angioplasty and a [[stent|C0038257]] placed in your [[heart|C0018787]] during the procedure.
